content: as vanilla as it gets sock recipe for plainish toe-up socks this is not a whole sock pattern but rather a recipe to be supplemented with your favourite toe and heel i prefer using short-row toe and heel constructions a fabulous one can be bought on ravelry for us $ 1 00 from the sox therapist http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fish-lips-kiss-heel this is a recipe for making socks which requires some knowledge on sock construction and your preferred sizing some hints on sizing are given based on my gauge and sock size the recipe gives hints and additional information that can be ignored if you use a different toe and / or heel construction notes and annotations ordo not need a mini-gusset with the flk heel gauge on 10x10 cm my sock measures 16cm 32 stitches and 48 row in stockinette after soaking circumference unstretched and fits a 21 cm circumference foot size see pics 56/57 stitches european 39 uk 6 us 8 5 narrow feet for a different size you can yarn either adjust your needle size about 450 yards of fingering opal hundertwasser edition or alter the stitch count by a shown in the photos multiple of four needles 2 5mm us 1½ stitch pattern row 1 knit all stitches row 2 #knit 3 purl 1# repeat between # © la maison de saba 2014 as vanilla as it gets page 1 of 2 v 1 1 instructions personally i like to use the fish lips kiss heel method for the toes as well with a provisional using your preferred toe construction cast on and work to a cast on cast on 29 stitches toe box of 5 cm length and 57 stitches circumference work a flk toe on 1+10+7+10+1 stitches pick up divide your work in 29 instep stitches and 28 sole stitches 28 sole stitches from the instep stitches are the beginning of your round provisional cast on the provisional cast on will give knit 1 row in the round you one stitch less for the sole as needed start pattern on 29 instep stitches end with p1 knit the sole stitches in plain stockinette i need a mini-gusset for my socks with the flk heel work 69 row in this established mode after 56 row i start the shaping of the mini gusset work your preferred short row heel kfb at each end of sole stitches every 3rd row 4 times this continue in the round working 13 row with pattern on gives me 69 row and 36 sole instep stitches and plain stockinette on the back of the leg stitches i then do the flk heel the former sole stitches on 2+1+10+10+10+1+2 in row 14 after the heel decrease the stitches on the back stitches and continue in the of the leg by one by ending the sole stitches with k2tog k1 round i then get rid off the mini-gusset by decreasing by in row 15 start with working patterning on instep stitches 1 on
